(1, 1, 1): Order of Merit with five classes, plus two palms and three medals
(2, 1, 1): 15 October 1897, 1897 - 1908 (Order of Congo), 1908 - present (as Belgian Order)
(3, 1, 1): TRAVAIL ET PROGRES -, ARBEID EN VOORUITGANG
(4, 1, 1): Eligible for persons above the age of 42
(5, 1, 1): Meritorious service to the Belgian state
